title: Static HTML/CSS Portfolio
features: Designed and launched a responsive, mobile‑first portfolio site using HTML5 and CSS3, achieving seamless cross‑browser performance.
Integrated multimedia content (video, images, icons) and social media links, boosting user engagement and showcasing multimedia handling skills.
Applied modern CSS techniques (Flexbox, Grid, media queries) to create a clean, intuitive layout that highlights personal branding and project highlights.
